required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity Study of Inactivated Vaccine for Prophylaxis of SARS CoV-2 Infection (COVID-19)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blinded, Placebo-Controlled, Phase Ⅰ/Ⅱ Clinical Trial, to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of the SARS-CoV-2 Inactivated Vaccine in Healthy Adults Aged 18~59 Years

lead_sponsor.agency: Sinovac Research and Development Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blinded, and placebo controlled phase Ⅰ/Ⅱ clinical trial of the SARS-CoV-2 inactivated vaccine manufactured by Sinovac Research & Development Co., Ltd. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of the experimental vaccine in healthy adults aged 18~59 Years.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blinded, single-center, placebo-controlled phase Ⅰ/Ⅱ clinical trial in adults aged 18~59 years. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of the experimental SARS-CoV-2 inactivated vaccine. The experimental vaccine and placebo were both manufactured by Sinovac Research & Development Co., Ltd. A total of 744 subjects will be enrolled, with 144 at phase Ⅰ, and 600 at phase Ⅱ. Participant will be assigned to receive two doses of experimental vaccine or placebo on the schedule of day 0,14 or day 0,28.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the beginning of the vaccination to 28 days after the whole schedule vaccination
primary_outcome.description: Occurence of adverse reactions post vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity indexes of neutralizing-antibody seroconversion rates for the emergency vaccination schedule （day 0,14）
primary_outcome.time_frame: The 14th day after two doses of vaccination
primary_outcome.description: The seroconversion rates of neutralizing antibodies against 2019 novel coronavirus tested by micro-neutralization assay in serum

primary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity indexes of neutralizing-antibody seroconversion rates for the routine vaccination schedule (day 0,28)
primary_outcome.time_frame: The 28th day after two doses of vaccination
primary_outcome.description: The seroconversion rates of neutralizing antibodies against 2019 novel coronavirus tested by micro-neutralization assay in serum

secondary_outcome.description: Occurence of adverse reactions post vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of abnormal changes of laboratory safety examinations (hemoglobin,WBCs, platelets, ALT, AST, total bilirubin, creatinine, creatine phosphokinase, urine protein, urine sugar, urinary erythrocyte)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The 3rd day after each dose injection
secondary_outcome.description: Safety index, abnormal changes will be defined as any one of the lab indexes experiencing changes out of clinical reference value range.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety indexes of serious adverse events (SAEs）
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the beginning of the vaccination to 6 months after two doses of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity indexes of neutralizing-antibody seroconversion rates
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 7,14,21,42 days after the first dose injection for emergency vaccination schedule and 28,35,42 days after the first dose injection for the routine vaccination schedules
secondary_outcome.description: The seroconversion rates of neutralizing antibodies against 2019 novel coronavirus tested by micro-neutralization assay in serum

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity indexes of IgG antibody seropositivity rates
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 7,14,21,28, 42 days after the first dose injection for emergency vaccination schedule and 28,35,42,56 days after the first dose injection for the routine vaccination schedule
secondary_outcome.description: The seropositivity rates of IgG antibody tested by ELISA serum

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity indexes IgM antibody seropositivity rates
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 7,14,21,28, 42 days after the first dose injection for emergency vaccination schedule and 28,35,42,56 days after the first dose injection for the routine vaccination schedule
secondary_outcome.description: The seropositivity rates of IgM antibody tested by ELISA serum

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity indexes of GMT of neutralizing-antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 7,14,21,28, 42 days after the first dose injection for emergency vaccination schedule and 28,35,42,56 days after the first dose injection for the routine vaccination schedule
secondary_outcome.description: The GMT of neutralizing antibody against 2019 novel coronavirus tested by micro-neutralization assay in serum

secondary_outcome.measure: Immunogenicity indexes of GMR of neutralizing-antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 7,14,21,28, 42 days after the first dose injection for emergency vaccination schedule and 28,35,42,56 days after the first dose injection for the routine vaccination schedule
secondary_outcome.description: The GMR of neutralizing antibody against 2019 novel coronavirus tested by micro-neutralization assay in serum

other_outcome.time_frame: The 14th day after each dose vaccination
6 months after two doses of vaccination
other_outcome.description: he seropositivity rates of neutralizing antibodies against 2019 novel coronavirus tested by micro-neutralization assay in serum

other_outcome.time_frame: 6 months after two doses of vaccination
other_outcome.description: The GMT of neutralizing antibody against 2019 novel coronavirus tested by micro-neutralization assay in serum

other_outcome.measure: Safety indexes-Seropositivity rates of antinuclear antibody
other_outcome.time_frame: The 7th day after each dose injection
other_outcome.description: Seropositivity rates of antinuclear antibody in serum

other_outcome.time_frame: The 7th day after each dose injection
other_outcome.description: Level of Inflammatory factors in serum

Two doses of high dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine at the emergency vaccination schedule
Two doses of placebo at the emergency vaccination schedule
Two doses of medium dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine at the routine vaccination schedule
Two doses of high dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine at the routine vaccination schedule
Two doses of placebo at the routine vaccination schedule
